user.title: Add Text-to-Speech Engine
user.description: Choose your TTS engine and provide the necessary configuration. See documentation for further info.

data_description.api_key: Required for official OpenAI engine. Leave blank if using Kokoro FastAPI or if not required by your OpenAI-compatible endpoint.
data_description.url: The API endpoint for OpenAI or your OpenAI-compatible proxy. Leave blank if using Kokoro FastAPI. Defaults to official OpenAI endpoint if not specified for OpenAI engine.
data_description.kokoro_url: The full URL for your Kokoro FastAPI TTS endpoint (e.g., http://localhost:8002/tts). Required if Kokoro FastAPI engine is selected.

error.wrong_api_key: Invalid API key. Please enter a valid API key.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the specified URL.
error.url_required_openai: API URL is required for the OpenAI engine.
error.kokoro_url_required: Kokoro FastAPI URL is required for the Kokoro FastAPI engine.

abort.already_configured: This TTS engine configuration is already registered.

init.title: Configure TTS Options
init.description: Adjust common TTS settings. To change engine type or main URLs, please re-add the integration.

data.model: Model (Note: Engine type cannot be changed here)
data.chime: Enable chime sound prior to speech (useful for announcements)
data.normalize_audio: Enable loudness normalization for generated audio (uses more CPU)
